classes.name: ImageAcquisitionSystem
classes.docstring: Mock implementation of the ImageAcquisitionSystem class.

methods.name: configure_with_profile
methods.docstring:
Configure the system with an acquisition profile.

Args:
    profile_name: Name of the profile to use

methods.name: connect_to_source
methods.docstring:
Connect to a data source.

Args:
    source_type: Type of source ("webcam", "file", "stream")
    source_id: ID or path of the source
    
Returns:
    bool: True if connection successful

methods.name: get_current_frame
methods.docstring:
Get the current frame from the acquisition process.

Returns:
    numpy.ndarray: Current frame or None if not available

methods.name: get_acquisition_stats
methods.docstring:
Get statistics about the acquisition process.

Returns:
    dict: Acquisition statistics
